property.name: Rules
property.value: As Charm School enters the battlefield, choose a color and balance Charm School on your head. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources of the chosen color. When Charm School falls off your head, sacrifice Charm School.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control no permanents other than The Cheese Stands Alone and have no cards in hand, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The meat, on the other hand, has frequent visitors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose another player. You gain 5 life. At the beginning of the first upkeep in your next game with that player, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a duel and taking a lickin' . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player and each of that player's teammates exchange life totals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you speak in non-rhyming sentences, sacrifice I'm Rubber, You're Glue. Say "I'm rubber, you're glue. Everything bounces off me and sticks to you": Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {1}{W}, Do the Hokey Pokey: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to Knight of the Hokey Pokey this turn. (To do the Hokey Pokey, choose an arm, a leg, or your whole self and put it in. Put it out. Put it in. Shake it all about. You do the Hokey Pokey Turn yourself around.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Lexivore deals damage to a player, destroy target permanent other than Lexivore with the most lines of text in its text box. (If two or more cards are tied, target any one of them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plucking the chicken - Elvish expression meaning "flinging the monkey"

card.name: Look at Me, I'm the DCI

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ban a card other than a basic land card for the rest of the match. (All cards with that name in any zone or sideboard are removed from the match.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few understand the DCI's rigorous decision-making process.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stand up, Flap your arms, Cluck like a chicken: Mesa Chicken gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lo lord of layers proudly comb-crested Hero to hens father to feathers Crowing sun-caller weaver of wattle Elder to eggs." - Rooster Saga

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike At the beginning of each other player's upkeep, you may compliment that player on their game play. If you don't, sacrifice Miss Demeanor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all permanents and all cards from all graveyards. Each player shuffles their hand into their library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 10. Exile Once More with Feeling. DCI ruling - A deck can have only one card named Once More with Feeling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonland permanent that doesn't share a color with clothing worn by its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Spring in Dominaria means pastels" - Excerpt from Mage's Home Journal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. If there are more people in the room of a different gender than you are as you cast this spell, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, at the beginning of the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER. When any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice Bureaucracy and said PLAYER discards their complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Censorship enters the battlefield, choose a word. Whenever a player says the chosen word, Censorship deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Editor's note: There were no suitable flavor text submissions for this card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only if there are three or more players in the game. Whenever a player casts a spell, each of that player's opponents may discard a card. If they do, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Bird. (You may roll dice only when instructed to.) Tap an untapped Bird you control: Roll a six-sided die. (Like now.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the Chicken Revolution, the king managed to keep his head while the others - well, just ran around.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Clambassadors deals damage to a player, choose an artifact, creature, or land you control. That player gains control of that permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sorry we shelled your village - here's some gold."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Clams down in Clamville All scootered and skittled - "The three is no more" The Clam fiddler fiddled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Clam Session enters the battlefield, choose a word. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sing at least six words of a song, at least one of which is the chosen word. If you don't, sacrifice Clam Session. You can't repeat a song.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell without asking your permission while casting it, counter that spell. When a player asks you permission to cast a spell and you refuse, counter that spell and sacrifice Common Courtesy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name, then target spell's controller reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry about it. It happens to every mage sooner or later."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose another player. You draw two cards. At the beginning of the first upkeep in your next game with that player, you draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a Bird creature with base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Free-for-All enters the battlefield, exile all creatures face down. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a card exiled with Free-for-All at random and puts it onto the battlefield. When Free-for-All leaves the battlefield, put all cards exiled with it into their owners' graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player plays with the top card of their library held against their forehead, revealed to each other player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Before any player casts a spell with the same name as a card in any graveyard, that player may say "sorry." If they don't, any other player may say "sorry" as the spell is being cast. When another player says "sorry" this way, counter the spell. Whenever a player says "sorry" at any other time, Sorry deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You must cast both B.F.M. cards to put leaves the battlefield, sacrifice the other. B.F.M. can't be blocked except by three or

property.name: Rules
property.value: You must cast both B.F.M. cards to put leaves the battlefield, sacrifice the other. B.F.M. can't be blocked except by three or

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: Return Deadhead from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if an opponent isn't touching their hand (of cards).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm back from the Dead," the zombie moaned. "And they were far out, man."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose another player. Look at that player's hand and choose a card other than a basic land card from it. They discard that card. At the beginning of the first upkeep in your next game with that player, look at that player's hand and choose a card other than a basic land card from it. They discard that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Handcuffs enters the battlefield, choose a player. When the chosen player's hands aren't touching each other, sacrifice Handcuffs and that player sacrifices three permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That was fun Now me." - Gwendlyn Di Corci

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike {1}{B}, Reveal Infernal Spawn of Evil from your hand, Say "It's coming": Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Jumbo Imp enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Jumbo Imp enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the result. At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die and put a number of +1/+1 counters on Jumbo Imp equal to the result. At the beginning of your end step, roll a six-sided die and remove a number of +1/+1 counters from Jumbo Imp equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your team may sacrifice any number of creatures. For each creature sacrificed this way, you add {B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lucy, you've got some spleenin' to do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals damage to a player, that player may say "Ow" once for each permanent named Ow. If the player doesn't, Ow deals 1 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Have you ever noticed how some flavor text has no relevance whatsoever to the card it's on?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature dies, you may roll a six-sided die. If you roll a 1, sacrifice Poultrygeist. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Poultrygeist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmer Brown never ate eggs again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Temp of the Damned enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Temp of the Damned enters the battlefield with a number of funk counters on it equal to the result. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a funk counter from Temp of the Damned. If you can't, sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player As Volrath's Motion Sensor enters the battlefield, choose one of enchanted player's hands. That player balances Volrath's Motion Sensor on the back of that hand. When Volrath's Motion Sensor falls off the chosen hand, sacrifice Volrath's Motion Sensor and enchanted player loses 3 life.

card.name: Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever any player taps a permanent, that player choose one of their opponents. The chosen player gains control of that permanent at the beginning of the next end step. At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't tap any nonland permanents that turn, Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. If you roll a 6, sacrifice Chicken Egg and create a 4/4 red Giant Bird creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's a lotta nuggets." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose another player. Double Deal deals 3 damage to that player. At the beginning of the first upkeep in your next game with that player, Double Deal deals 3 damage to the player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Reflip any coin or reroll any die. (Activate only any time it makes sense.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glok loved bets He'd sit in the bar all night an' laugh an' laugh. Hey - he still owes me." - Squee, goblin casino hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Goblin Bowling Team would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus the result of a six-sided die roll to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flog was out of his league - this game wasn't up his alley, but the team couldn't spare him if he split.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. If you roll a 1, Goblin Tutor has no effect. Otherwise, search your library for the indicated card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. 2 - A card named Goblin Tutor 3 - An enchantment 4 - An artifact 5 - A creature 6 - An instant or sorcery

property.name: Rules
property.value: Denimwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player is wearing denim.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing comes between me and my Didgeridoos™."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}: Shuffle Jalum Grifter and two lands you control face down. Target opponent chooses one of those cards. Turn the cards face up. If they chose Jalum Grifter, sacrifice it. Otherwise, destroy target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. If you a roll a 1, sacrifice Krazy Kow and it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a land type. Exile all lands you control of that type. Drop those cards, one at a time, onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Destroy each permanent completely covered by those cards. Then return the cards you dropped to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell that targets a single player, each player rolls a six-sided die. Change the target of that spell to the player with the lowest result. Reroll to break ties, if necessary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spark Fiend enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. If you rolled 2, 3, or 12, sacrifice Spark Fiend. If you rolled 7 or 11, don't roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeeps. If you rolled any other total, note that total. At the beginning of your upkeep, roll two six-sided dice. If you rolled 7, sacrifice Spark Fiend. If you roll the noted total, don't roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeeps. Otherwise, do nothing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. Strategy, Schmategy has the indicated effect. 1 - Do nothing. 2 - Destroy all artifacts. 3 - Destroy all lands. 4 - Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. 5 - Each player discards their hand and draws seven cards. 6 - Repeat this process two more times.

card.name: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service deals X damage to each of Y target creatures and Z target players or planeswalkers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The number printed on the card is no longer in service. For help, go to wizards.custhelp.com or find us on Twitter @Wizards_Help.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature For each other card named Cardboard Carapace you have with you outside the game, enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose another player. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. At the beginning of the first upkeep in your next game with that player, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Elvish Impersonators enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die twice. Its base power becomes the first result and its base toughness becomes the second result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip X coins. For each flip you win, create a 2/2 green Sheep creature token named Rabid Sheep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And their bleating was like a wet salmon slapped upon the land - slap slap slap

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Roll two six-sided dice. If both results are the same, Free-Range Chicken gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that result. If the total of those results is equal to any other total you have rolled this turn for this ability, sacrifice it. (For example, if you roll two 3s, it gets +3/+3. If you roll a 4 and a 2 for this ability later that turn, sacrifice it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all lands. Give each player a number of those cards chosen at random equal to the number of those cards the player controlled. Each player returns those cards to the battlefield under their control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghazbán Ogress enters the battlefield, if one player has won more Magic games that day than any other player, that player gains control of Ghazbán Ogress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: MORE TO LOVE: Friendly, nature-loving, Bunyonesque SEM seeks SEF looking for a huge commitment. . . .seeks atog prince

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Magic game you have lost to one of your opponents since you last won a game against them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now I lay me down to sleep What are you starin' at?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you don't, sacrifice Hungry Hungry Heifer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player searches their library for any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mine, Mine, Mine enters the battlefield, each player puts their library into their hand. Players have no maximum hand size and don't lose the game for drawing from an empty library. Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn. When Mine, Mine, Mine leaves the battlefield, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Reveal a card in your hand, covering the artist credit. Target opponent guesses the artist. If they guess wrong, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the ignorant shall fall to the squirrels." - Chip 2:54

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures target player's team controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Due to some late-night partying, the chicken missed the group photo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just wait till I get my Leviathan . . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Coupon: Target player gets you target drink. You pay any costs for the drink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Limited time offer. Void where prohibited. Limit one per purchase. Valid only in participating duels. This coupon is nontransferable and invalid if shattered, crumbled, detonated, pillaged, or otherwise disenchanted. Cash value less than 1/20 of a cent. Offer not valid in Quebec, Rhode Island, or where prohibited by law or the DCI.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Tear Blacker Lotus into pieces. Add four mana of any one color. Remove the pieces from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. You must speak in a voice other than your normal voice. When you speak in your normal voice, sacrifice Bronze Calendar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every page holds a month, every date a numeral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Tear Chaos Confetti into pieces. Throw the pieces onto the battlefield from a distance of at least five feet. Destroy each permanent that a piece touches. Remove the pieces from the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And you thought that was just an urban legend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}, Throw Clay Pigeon into the air at least two feet above your head while seated: If you catch Clay Pigeon with one hand, prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you this turn and tap Clay Pigeon. Otherwise, sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Move a counter from one permanent onto another. If the second permanent refers to any kind of counter, the moved counter becomes one of those counters. Otherwise, it becomes a +1/+1 counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a villain would unleash a giant fan on anyone

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Roll a six-sided die. This ability has the indicated effect. 1 - Sacrifice Jack-in-the-Mox and you lose 5 life. 2 - Add {W}. 3 - Add {U}. 4 - Add {B}. 5 - Add {R}. 6 - Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Sombrero: Look at target player's sideboard, choose three cards from it, and remove those cards from the match.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mirror Mirror enters the battlefield tapped. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Mirror: Choose target player. At the beginning of the next end step, exchange life totals with that player, exchange control of all permanents you and that player control, and exchange cards in your hands, cards in your libraries, and cards in your graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures named Rock Lobster can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tiger is always quick to fold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures named Scissors Lizard can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many take the lobster for granite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures named Paper Tiger can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing beats the lizard's shear power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Spatula of the Ages: You may put a silver-bordered or acorn permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At last Urza's powers were focused through the incredible artifact. "Who wants pancakes?" he asked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Urza's Contact Lenses enters the battlefield tapped. Urza's Contact Lenses doesn't untap during your untap step. As long as Urza's Contact Lenses is untapped, all players play with their hands revealed. Clap your hands twice: You may tap or untap Urza's Contact Lenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Roll a six-sided die. Urza's Science Fair Project gets the indicated result. 1 - It gets -2/-2 until end of turn. 2 - Prevent all combat damage it would deal this turn. 3 - It gains vigilance until end of turn. 4 - It gains first strike until end of turn. 5 - It gains flying until end of turn. 6 - It gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
